8:7 Elisa masuk ke Damsyik, dan pada waktu itu aBenhadad, raja Aram, sedang sakit. Ketika dikabarkan kepada raja: Sudah datang abdi Allah ke mari,

8:7 And Elisha went to Damascus. And a Ben-hadad the king of Syria was sick. And it was told him, saying, The man of God has come here.

 

8:8 berkatalah ia kepada aHazael: Ambillah persembahan, pergilah menyongsong abdi Allah itu dan mintalah petunjuk Tuhan dengan perantaraannya: Sembuhkah aku dari bpenyakit ini?

8:8 And the king said to a Hazael, Take a gift with you, and go to meet the man of God; and inquire of Jehovah through him, saying, Will I recover from this b sickness?

 

8:9 Lalu pergilah Hazael menyongsong dia, diambilnyalah persembahan berupa segala barang yang indah-indah dari Damsyik, sebanyak muatan empat puluh ekor unta. Sesudah sampai, tampillah ia ke depan Elisa dan berkata: Anakmu Benhadad, raja Aram, menyuruh aku menanyakan kepadamu: Apakah aku akan sembuh dari penyakit ini?

8:9 So Hazael went to meet him; and he took a gift with him, even all good things of Damascus, forty camel loads. And he came and stood before him and said, Your son Ben-hadad the king of Syria has sent me to you, saying, Will I recover from this sickness?

 

8:10 Jawab Elisa kepadanya: 1Pergilah, katakanlah kepadanya: Pastilah engkau sembuh. Namun demikian, Tuhan telah memperlihatkan kepadaku, bahwa ia pasti mati dibunuh.

8:10 And Elisha said to him, 1 Go and say to him, You shall certainly recover; however Jehovah has shown me that he shall certainly die.

 

8:11 Elisa menatap dengan lama ke depan, lalu menangislah abdi Allah itu.

8:11 And he fixed his gaze and stared at him until he was ashamed. Then the man of God began to weep.

 

8:12 Hazael berkata: Mengapa tuanku menangis? Jawab Elisa: Sebab aku tahu bagaimana malapetaka yang akan kaulakukan kepada aorang Israel: kotanya yang berkubu akan kaucampakkan ke dalam api, terunanya akan kaubunuh dengan pedang, bayinya akan kauremukkan dan perempuannya yang mengandung akan kaubelah.

8:12 And Hazael said, Why are you weeping, my lord? And he said, Because I know the evil that you will do to the a children of Israel: Their strongholds you will set on fire, and their choice young men you will slay with the sword, and their little ones you will dash to pieces, and their pregnant women you will rip open.

 

8:13 Sesudah itu berkatalah Hazael: Tetapi apakah hambamu ini, yang tidak lain dari anjing saja, sehingga ia dapat melakukan hal sehebat itu? Jawab Elisa: Tuhan telah memperlihatkan kepadaku, bahwa engkau akan menjadi raja atas aAram.

8:13 And Hazael said, But what is your servant, who is but a dog, that he should do this great thing? And Elisha said, Jehovah has shown me that you will be king over a Syria.

 

8:14 Lalu ia pergi dan meninggalkan Elisa dan setelah ia sampai kepada tuannya, berkatalah raja kepadanya: Apakah dikatakan Elisa kepadamu? Jawabnya: Ia berkata kepadaku, bahwa pastilah engkau sembuh.

8:14 And he went from Elisha and came to his master. And his master said to him, What did Elisha say to you? And he said, He told me that you shall certainly recover.

 

8:15 Tetapi keesokan harinya ia mengambil sehelai selimut yang telah dicelupkannya ke dalam air dan membentangkannya ke atas muka raja. Jadi matilah raja, dan Hazael menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

8:15 But on the next day he took the heavy covering over Ben-hadad and dipped it in water and spread it over his face, so that he died; and Hazael reigned in his place.

 

 

 

 

P. Kekuasaan Yoram atas Yehuda

P. The reign of Jehoram over Judah

 

8:16-24a

8:16-24a

 

8:16 Dalam tahun kelima zaman aYoram, anak Ahab raja Israel - pada waktu itu Yosafat adalah raja Yehuda - Yoram, anak Yosafat raja Yehuda menjadi raja.

8:16 Now in the fifth year of a Joram the son of Ahab, the king of Israel, while Jehoshaphat was king of Judah, Jehoram the son of Jehoshaphat, the king of Judah, began to reign.

 

8:17 aIa berumur tiga puluh dua tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan delapan tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem.

8:17 a He was thirty-two years old when he began to reign, and he reigned eight years in Jerusalem.

 

8:18 Ia hidup menurut kelakuan raja-raja Israel seperti yang dilakukan keluarga Ahab, sebab yang menjadi isterinya adalah anak Ahab. Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata Tuhan.

8:18 And he walked in the way of the kings of Israel and as the house of Ahab had done, for Ahabs daughter was his wife; and he did what was evil in the sight of Jehovah.

 

8:19 Namun demikian, Tuhan tidak mau memusnahkan Yehuda oleh karena 1Daud, hamba-Nya, sesuai dengan yang dijanjikan-Nya kepada Daud, bahwa Ia hendak memberikan 2aketurunan kepadanya dan kepada anak-anaknya untuk selama-lamanya.

8:19 But Jehovah would not destroy Judah, because of 1 David His servant, as He had promised him that for his sake He would provide a a lamp for his children always.

 

8:20 Pada zamannya memberontaklah aEdom dan melepaskan diri dari kekuasaan Yehuda dan mereka mengangkat seorang raja atas mereka sendiri.

8:20 In his days a Edom revolted from under the hand of Judah, and they installed a king over themselves.

 

8:21 Maka majulah 1Yoram ke Zair bersama-sama dengan seluruh keretanya; pada waktu malam bangunlah ia, lalu bersama-sama dengan para panglima pasukan kereta ia menerobos barisan orang Edom yang mengepung dia, tetapi rakyatnya melarikan diri pulang ke kemahnya.

8:21 So 1 Joram crossed over to Zair, and all his chariots with him. And he rose up at night and struck the Edomites all around him and the captains of the chariots, but his people fled to their tents.

 

8:22 Demikianlah Edom memberontak dan terlepas dari kekuasaan Yehuda sampai sekarang ini. Lalu Libna pun memberontak pada masa itu juga.

8:22 So Edom revolted from under the hand of Judah, as it is to this day. Then Libnah revolted at the same time.

 

8:23 Selebihnya dari riwayat Yoram dan segala yang dilakukannya, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Yehuda?

8:23 And the rest of the acts of Joram and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

 

8:24a Kemudian Yoram mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya, dan ia dikuburkan di samping nenek moyangnya di akota Daud.

8:24a And Joram slept with his fathers and was buried with his fathers in the a city of David.

 

 

 

 

Q. Kekuasaan Ahazia atas Yehuda

Q. The reign of Ahaziah over Judah

 

8:24b-29

8:24b-29

 

 

 

 

8:24b Maka Ahazia, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

8:24b And Ahaziah his son reigned in his place.

 

8:25 Dalam tahun kedua belas zaman Yoram, anak Ahab raja Israel, aAhazia, anak Yoram raja Yehuda, menjadi raja.

8:25 In the twelfth year of Joram the son of Ahab, the king of Israel, a Ahaziah the son of Jehoram, the king of Judah, began to reign.

 

8:26 Ia berumur dua puluh dua tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan setahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Nama ibunya ialah Atalya, cucu Omri raja Israel.

8:26 Ahaziah was twenty-two years old when he began to reign, and he reigned one year in Jerusalem. And his mothers name was Athaliah, the 1 daughter of Omri the king of Israel.

 

8:27 Ia hidup menurut kelakuan keluarga Ahab dan ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata Tuhan sama seperti keluarga Ahab, sebab ia adalah seorang menantu dari keluarga itu.

8:27 And he walked in the way of the house of Ahab and did what was evil in the sight of Jehovah, like the house of Ahab; for he was a son-in-law to the house of Ahab.

 

8:28 Ia pergi bersama-sama Yoram bin Ahab untuk berperang melawan Hazael, raja Aram, di Ramot-Gilead. Tetapi orang-orang Aram amelukai Yoram.

8:28 And he went with Joram the son of Ahab to fight with Hazael the king of Syria at Ramoth-gilead. And the Syrians a struck Joram.

 

8:29 Kemudian pulanglah raja Yoram ke Yizreel, supaya diobati luka-lukanya yang ditimbulkan orang Aram di Rama pada waktu ia berperang melawan Hazael, raja Aram. Dan Ahazia, anak Yoram raja Yehuda, pergi menjenguk Yoram bin Ahab di aYizreel, karena dia sakit.

8:29 And Joram the king returned to heal in Jezreel of his wounds that the Syrians had inflicted on him in Ramah when he fought with Hazael the king of Syria. And Ahaziah the son of Jehoram, the king of Judah, went down to see Joram the son of Ahab in a Jezreel, for he was sick.

 

 

 

 

2 RAJA-RAJA 9

2 KINGS 9

 

 

 

 

R. Kekuasaan Yehu atas Israel

R. The reign of Jehu over Israel

 

9:1-10:36

9:1-10:36

 

 

 

 

9:1 Kemudian nabi Elisa memanggil salah seorang dari rombongan nabi dan berkata kepadanya: aIkatlah pinggangmu, bawalah buli-buli berisi bminyak ini dan pergilah ke Ramot-Gilead.

9:1 And Elisha the prophet called one of the sons of the prophets and said to him, a Gird up your loins, and take this flask of b oil in your hand, and go to Ramoth-gilead.

 

9:2 Apabila engkau sampai ke sana, carilah aYehu bin Yosafat bin Nimsi; masuklah, ajak dia bangkit dari tengah-tengah temannya dan bawalah dia ke ruang dalam.

9:2 And when you arrive there, look there for a Jehu the son of Jehoshaphat, the son of Nimshi; and go in and make him rise up from among his brothers, and bring him to an inner room.

 

9:3 Kemudian ambillah buli-buli berisi minyak itu, lalu tuangkan isinya ke atas kepalanya dan katakan: Beginilah firman Tuhan: Telah aKuurapi engkau menjadi raja atas Israel! Sesudah itu bukalah pintu, larilah dan jangan berlambat-lambat.

9:3 Then take the flask of oil and pour it on his head and say, Thus says Jehovah, I have a anointed you king over Israel. Then open the door and flee, and do not delay.

 

9:4 Lalu nabi muda itu pergi ke Ramot-Gilead.

9:4 So the young man, the prophets attendant, went to Ramoth-gilead.

 

9:5 Setelah ia sampai, maka tampaklah panglima-panglima tentara sedang duduk berkumpul. Lalu ia berkata: Ada pesan kubawa untukmu, ya panglima! Yehu bertanya: Untuk siapa dari kami sekalian? Jawabnya: Untukmu, ya panglima!

9:5 And when he came, there the captains of the army were sitting. And he said, I have a word for you, O captain. And Jehu said, To which one of all of us? And he said, To you, O captain.

 

9:6 Lalu bangkitlah Yehu dan masuk ke dalam rumah. Nabi muda itu menuang minyak ke atas kepala Yehu serta berkata kepadanya: Beginilah firman Tuhan, Allah Israel: Telah Kuurapi engkau menjadi raja atas umat Tuhan, yaitu orang Israel.

9:6 And he rose up and went into the house; and he poured the oil on his head and said to him, Thus says Jehovah the God of Israel, I have anointed you king over the people of Jehovah, over Israel.

 

9:7 Maka engkau akan membunuh keluarga tuanmu Ahab dan dengan demikian Aku membalaskan kepada 1aIzebel darah hamba-hamba-Ku, nabi-nabi itu, bahkan bdarah semua hamba Tuhan.

9:7 And you shall strike the house of Ahab your master, and I will avenge the a blood of My servants the prophets and the blood of all the servants of Jehovah at the hand of 1b Jezebel.

 

9:8 Dan segenap keluarga aAhab akan binasa; dan Aku akan melenyapkan dari pada Ahab setiap orang laki-laki, baik yang tinggi maupun yang rendah kedudukannya di Israel.

9:8 And the whole house of a Ahab will perish, and I will cut off from Ahab every male, bond and free, in Israel;

 

9:9 Dan Aku akan memperlakukan keluarga Ahab sama seperti akeluarga Yerobeam bin Nebat dan sama seperti keluarga bBaesa bin Ahia.

9:9 And I will make the house of Ahab like the a house of Jeroboam the son of Nebat and like the house of b Baasha the son of Ahijah;

 

9:10 Izebel akan adimakan anjing di kebun di luar Yizreel dengan tidak ada orang yang menguburkannya. Kemudian nabi itu membuka pintu, lalu lari.

9:10 And the dogs shall a eat Jezebel in the lot of Jezreel, and there will be none to bury her. Then he opened the door and fled.

 

9:11 Apabila Yehu keluar mendapatkan pegawai-pegawai tuannya, berkatalah seorang kepadanya: Apa kabar? Mengapa aorang gila itu datang kepadamu? Jawabnya kepada mereka: Kamu sendiri mengenal orang itu dengan omongannya!

9:11 And when Jehu came out to the servants of his master, someone said to him, Is all well? Why did this a mad fellow come to you? And he said to them, You know the man and his ranting.

 

9:12 Tetapi mereka berkata: Dusta! Cobalah beritahukan kepada kami! Lalu katanya: Begini-beginilah dikatakannya kepadaku: Demikianlah firman Tuhan: Telah Kuurapi engkau menjadi raja atas Israel.

9:12 And they said, That is a lie; please tell us. And he said, Thus and thus he said to me, saying, Thus says Jehovah, I have anointed you king over Israel.

 

9:13 Segeralah mereka masing-masing mengambil apakaiannya dan membentangkannya di hadapan kakinya begitu saja di atas tangga, kemudian mereka meniup bsangkakala serta berseru: Yehu raja!

9:13 Then they moved quickly; and every man took his a garment and put it under him on the bare steps; and they blew the b trumpet and said, Jehu is king!

 

9:14 Demikianlah Yehu bin Yosafat bin Nimsi mengadakan persepakatan melawan 1Yoram. Adapun Yoram sedang berjaga-jaga di aRamot-Gilead, bersama-sama dengan segenap orang Israel menghadapi bHazael, raja Aram.

9:14 And Jehu the son of Jehoshaphat, the son of Nimshi, conspired against 1 Joram. (Now Joram had been defending a Ramoth-gilead, he and all Israel, because of b Hazael the king of Syria,

 

9:15 Tetapi raja Yoram sendiri telah pulang ke Yizreel, supaya aluka-lukanya diobati, yang ditimbulkan orang Aram pada waktu ia berperang melawan Hazael, raja Aram. - Yehu berkata: Jika kamu sudah setuju, janganlah biarkan siapa pun meloloskan diri dari kota untuk memberitahukan hal itu ke Yizreel.

9:15 But Jehoram the king returned to be healed in Jezreel of the a wounds which the Syrians had inflicted on him when he fought Hazael the king of Syria). And Jehu said, If this is your desire, let no fugitive depart from the city and go and tell it in Jezreel.

 

9:16 Kemudian Yehu naik kereta dan pergi ke Yizreel, sebab Yoram berbaring sakit di sana. Juga aAhazia, raja Yehuda, datang menjenguk Yoram.

9:16 So Jehu rode off in a chariot and went to Jezreel, for Joram was lying ill there. And a Ahaziah the king of Judah had come down to see Joram.

 

9:17 Ketika jaga yang sedang berdiri di atas menara di Yizreel, melihat pasukan Yehu datang, berserulah ia: Ada kulihat suatu pasukan. Berkatalah Yoram: Ambillah seorang penunggang kuda, suruhlah ia menemui mereka serta menanyakan: apakah ini kabar damai?

9:17 And the watchman stood on the tower in Jezreel and saw Jehus multitude as he came, and he said, I see a multitude. And Jehoram said, Take a horseman, and send him to meet them; and let him say, Is there peace?

 

9:18 Lalu pergilah penunggang kuda itu untuk menemuinya dan berkata: Beginilah tanya raja: apakah ini kabar damai? Jawab Yehu: Damai? Bukan urusanmu! Baliklah, ikutlah aku! Dan jaga itu memberitahukan: Suruhan sudah sampai kepada mereka, tetapi ia tidak pulang.

9:18 So the horseman went to meet him and said, Thus says the king, Is there peace? And Jehu said, What do you have to do with peace? Turn behind me. And the watchman reported, saying, The messenger went to them but did not return.

 

9:19 Disuruhnyalah penunggang kuda yang kedua dan setelah sampai kepada mereka berkatalah ia: Beginilah tanya raja: apakah ini kabar damai? Jawab Yehu: Damai? Bukan urusanmu! Baliklah, ikutlah aku!

9:19 And he sent out a second horseman; and he came to them and said, Thus says the king, Is there peace? And Jehu said, What do you have to do with peace? Turn behind me.

 

9:20 Dan jaga itu memberitahukan: Sudah sampai ia kepada mereka, tetapi ia tidak pulang! Dan cara memacunya adalah seperti cara Yehu, cucu Nimsi, memacu, sebab ia memacu seperti orang gila.

9:20 And the watchman reported, saying, He went to them but did not return; and the driving is like the driving of Jehu the son of Nimshi, because he drives furiously.

 

9:21 Sesudah itu berkatalah Yoram: Pasanglah kereta!, lalu orang memasang keretanya. Maka keluarlah aYoram, raja Israel, dan Ahazia, raja Yehuda, masing-masing naik keretanya; mereka keluar menemui Yehu, lalu menjumpai dia di kebun bNabot, orang Yizreel itu.

9:21 And Jehoram said, Yoke the chariot! And someone yoked his chariot. And a Jehoram the king of Israel and Ahaziah the king of Judah went out, each in his chariot, and went to meet Jehu; and they found him in the lot of b Naboth the Jezreelite.

 

9:22 Tatkala Yoram melihat Yehu, bertanyalah ia: Apakah ini kabar damai, hai Yehu? Jawabnya: Bagaimana ada damai, selama sundal dan orang sihir ibumu Izebel begitu banyak!

9:22 And when Jehoram saw Jehu, he said, Is there peace, Jehu? And he said, What peace can there be, so long as the harlotries and sorceries of Jezebel your mother are so many?

 

9:23 Segera Yoram berputar1 dan mau melarikan diri sambil berseru kepada Ahazia: Itu tipu, Ahazia!

9:23 And Jehoram turned the 1 reins and tried to flee. And he said to Ahaziah, Treachery, Ahaziah!

 

9:24 Tetapi Yehu menarik busurnya dengan sepenuh kekuatannya, lalu memanah Yoram di antara kedua bahunya, sehingga anak panah itu menembus jantungnya, maka rebahlah ia di dalam keretanya.

9:24 And Jehu drew his bow with full strength and struck Jehoram between his arms; and the arrow went through his heart, and he sank down in his chariot.

 

9:25 Kemudian berkatalah Yehu kepada Bidkar, perwiranya: Angkat dan lemparkanlah mayatnya ke kebun Nabot, orang Yizreel itu, sebab ketahuilah, bahwa pada waktu aku dan engkau berdampingan menunggang kuda mengikuti Ahab, ayahnya, maka Tuhan telah mengucapkan terhadap dia hukuman ini:

9:25 And Jehu said to Bidkar his officer, Take him up, and throw him in the lot of the field of Naboth the Jezreelite; for remember how you and I were riding together behind Ahab his father, and Jehovah uttered this oracle against him:

 

9:26 Sesungguhnya, Aku telah melihat adarah Nabot dan darah anak-anaknya tadi malam, demikianlah firman Tuhan, maka Aku akan membalaskannya kepadamu di kebun ini, demikianlah firman Tuhan. Oleh sebab itu angkat dan lemparkanlah mayatnya ke kebun ini, sesuai dengan firman Tuhan.

9:26 Surely I have seen the a blood of Naboth and the blood of his sons yesterday, declares Jehovah; and I will repay you in this lot, declares Jehovah. And now, take him up and throw him in the lot, according to the word of Jehovah.

 

9:27 Ketika aAhazia, raja Yehuda, melihat itu, maka ia pun melarikan diri ke arah Bet-Hagan, tetapi Yehu mengejarnya sambil berkata: Panahlah dia juga! Maka mereka memanah dia di atas keretanya di pendakian ke Gur dekat Yibleam. Ia lari ke Megido dan mati di sana.

9:27 And a Ahaziah the king of Judah saw this and fled toward the garden house; and Jehu pursued after him and said, Strike him too in his chariot. So they struck him at the ascent of Gur, which is by Ibleam. And he fled to Megiddo and died there.

 

9:28 Para pegawainya mengangkut mayatnya ke Yerusalem, lalu mereka menguburkan dia dalam kuburnya sendiri, di samping nenek moyangnya di kota Daud.

9:28 And his servants carried him in a chariot to Jerusalem and buried him in his grave with his fathers in the city of David.

 

9:29 Adapun aAhazia menjadi raja atas Yehuda dalam tahun kesebelas zaman Yoram bin Ahab.

9:29 And in the eleventh year of Joram the son of Ahab, a Ahaziah began to reign over Judah.

 

9:30 Sampailah Yehu ke Yizreel. Ketika Izebel mendengar itu, ia mencalak matanya, dihiasinyalah kepalanya, lalu ia menjenguk dari jendela.

9:30 And Jehu came to Jezreel; and Jezebel heard of it. And she put paint on her eyes and adorned her head, and she looked out the window.

 

9:31 Pada waktu Yehu masuk pintu gerbang, berserulah Izebel: Bagaimana, selamatkah aZimri, pembunuh tuannya itu?

9:31 And as Jehu entered the gate, she said, Is all well, a Zimri, you murderer of 1 your master?

 

9:32 Yehu mengangkat kepalanya melihat ke jendela itu dan berkata: Siapa yang di pihakku? Siapa? Dan ketika dua tiga orang pegawai istana menjenguk kepadanya,

9:32 And he lifted up his face to the window and said, Who is on my side? Who? And two or three eunuchs looked out at him.

 

9:33 ia berseru: Jatuhkanlah dia! Mereka menjatuhkan dia, sehingga darahnya memercik ke dinding dan ke kuda; mayatnya pun terinjak-injak.

9:33 And he said, Throw her down. And they threw her down. And some of her blood spattered on the wall and on the horses, and he trampled her.

 

9:34 Yehu masuk ke dalam, lalu makan dan minum. Kemudian ia berkata: Baiklah urus mayat orang yang terkutuk itu dan kuburkanlah dia, sebab ia memang anak raja.

9:34 And he came in, and ate and drank, and said, Attend now to this cursed woman and bury her, for she is a kings daughter.

 

9:35 Mereka pergi untuk menguburkannya, tetapi mereka tidak menjumpai mayatnya, hanya kepala dan kedua kaki dan kedua telapak tangannya.

9:35 But when they went to bury her, they found no more of her than her skull and her feet and the palms of her hands.

 

9:36 Mereka kembali memberitahukannya kepada Yehu, lalu ia berkata: Memang begitulah firman Tuhan yang diucapkan-Nya dengan perantaraan hamba-Nya, Elia, orang Tisbe itu: 1Di kebun di luar Yizreel akan adimakan anjing daging Izebel;

9:36 And they returned and reported it to him. And he said, This is the word of Jehovah, which He spoke through His servant Elijah the Tishbite, saying, 1 In the lot of Jezreel the dogs will a eat the flesh of Jezebel;

 

9:37 maka mayat Izebel akan terhampar di kebun di luar Yizreel seperti pupuk di ladang, sehingga tidak ada orang yang dapat berkata: Inilah Izebel.

9:37 And the corpse of Jezebel will be like dung upon the surface of the field in the lot of Jezreel, so that they will not say, This is Jezebel.

 

 

 

 

2 RAJA-RAJA 10

2 KINGS 10

 

 

 

 

10:1 Ahab mempunyai tujuh puluh orang anak laki-laki di Samaria. Yehu menulis surat, dan mengirimnya ke Samaria, kepada pembesar kota itu, kepada para tua-tua dan kepada 1para pengasuh anak-anak Ahab, bunyinya:

10:1 Now Ahab had seventy sons in Samaria, and Jehu wrote letters and sent them to Samaria to the rulers of Jezreel, the elders, and to the 1 guardians of the children of Ahab, saying,

 

10:2 Sekarang, segera sesudah surat ini sampai kepadamu, kamu yang mempunyai anak-anak tuanmu di bawah pengawasanmu, lagipula mempunyai kereta dan kuda dan kota yang berkubu serta senjata,

10:2 Now then, when this letter comes to you, since your masters sons are with you, and there are with you chariots and horses, a fortified city and weapons,

 

10:3 maka pilihlah seorang yang terbaik dan yang paling tepat dari antara anak-anak tuanmu, lalu dudukkanlah dia di atas takhta ayahnya, kemudian berperanglah membela keluarga tuanmu.

10:3 Look for the best and fittest of your masters sons, and set him on the throne of his father, and fight for your masters house.

 

10:4 Tetapi mereka sangat takut dan berkata: Sedangkan kedua raja itu tidak dapat bertahan menghadapinya, bagaimana mungkin kita ini dapat bertahan?

10:4 But they feared very greatly and said, If the two kings could not stand before him, how then can we stand before him?

 

10:5 Sebab itu kepala istana dan kepala kota, juga para tua-tua dan para pengasuh mengirim pesan kepada Yehu, bunyinya: Kami ini hamba-hambamu dan segala yang kaukatakan kepada kami akan kami lakukan; kami tidak hendak mengangkat seseorang menjadi raja; lakukanlah apa yang baik menurut pemandanganmu.

10:5 And he who was over the household and he that was over the city and the elders and the guardians of the children sent word to Jehu, saying, We are your servants; all that you say to us, we will do. We will not make anyone king. What is good in your sight, do.

 

10:6 Kemudian Yehu menulis surat untuk kedua kalinya kepada mereka, bunyinya: Jika kamu memihak kepadaku dan mau menurut perkataanku, ambillah kepala anak-anak tuanmu dan datanglah kepadaku besok kira-kira waktu ini ke Yizreel. Adapun ketujuh puluh anak raja itu tinggal bersama-sama orang-orang besar di kota itu, yang mendidik mereka.

10:6 Then he wrote a letter to them a second time, saying, If you are mine and listen to my voice, take the heads of the sons of your master, and come to me at Jezreel tomorrow at this time. Now the kings sons, seventy men, were with the great men of the city, who had brought them up.

 

10:7 Tatkala surat itu sampai kepada mereka, mereka mengambil aanak-anak raja itu, menyembelih ketujuh puluh orang itu, menaruh kepala orang-orang itu ke dalam keranjang dan mengirimkan semuanya kepada Yehu di Yizreel.

10:7 And when the letter reached them, they took the kings a sons and slaughtered them, seventy men; and they placed their heads in baskets and sent them to him in Jezreel.

 

10:8 Ketika suruhan datang memberitahukan kepadanya: Telah dibawa orang kepala anak-anak raja itu, berkatalah Yehu: Susunlah semuanya menjadi dua timbunan di depan pintu gerbang sampai pagi.

10:8 And the messenger came and told him, saying, They have brought the heads of the kings sons. And he said, Put them in two heaps at the entrance of the gate until the morning.

 

10:9 Pada paginya keluarlah Yehu, berdirilah ia, lalu berkata kepada segenap orang banyak: Kamu ini tidak bersalah. Memang akulah yang telah mengadakan apersepakatan melawan tuanku dan telah membunuh dia; tetapi semua orang ini, siapakah yang membunuh mereka?

10:9 And in the morning he went out and stood and said to all the people, You are righteous. I a conspired against my master and have killed him; but who struck all these?

 

10:10 Ketahuilah sekarang, bahwa firman Tuhan yang telah adiucapkan Tuhan tentang keluarga Ahab, btidak ada yang tidak dipenuhi, Tuhan telah melakukan apa yang difirmankan-Nya dengan perantaraan Elia, hamba-Nya.

10:10 Know therefore that nothing of the word of Jehovah, which Jehovah a spoke concerning the house of Ahab, shall b fall to the earth; for Jehovah has done that which He spoke through His servant Elijah.

 

10:11 Lalu Yehu membunuh semua orang yang masih tinggal dari keluarga Ahab yang di Yizreel, juga semua orang besarnya, orang-orang kepercayaannya dan imam-imamnya; tidak ada padanya seorang pun yang ditinggalkan Yehu hidup.

10:11 So Jehu killed all that remained of the house of Ahab in Jezreel and all his great men and his acquaintances and his priests, until he left him no one remaining.

 

10:12 Kemudian bangkitlah Yehu pergi ke Samaria. Di jalan dekat Bet-Eked, perkampungan para gembala,

10:12 Then he rose up and departed and came into Samaria. And while he was at the 1 shepherds meeting place on the way,

 

10:13 bertemulah ia dengan sanak saudara Ahazia, raja Yehuda, lalu ia bertanya: Siapakah kamu ini? Jawab mereka: Kami adalah sanak saudara Ahazia dan kami datang untuk memberi salam kepada anak-anak raja dan anak-anak ibu suri.

10:13 Jehu came upon the brothers of Ahaziah the king of Judah; and he said, Who are you? And they said, We are the brothers of Ahaziah, and have come down to greet the sons of the king and the sons of the queen mother.

 

10:14 Berkatalah Yehu: Tangkaplah mereka hidup-hidup! Lalu ditangkaplah mereka hidup-hidup dan disembelih dekat perigi Bet-Eked, empat puluh dua orang, dan tidak ada seorang pun ditinggalkannya hidup dari pada mereka.

10:14 And he said, Take them alive. And they took them alive and slew them, forty-two men, at the pit of the 1 meeting place; and he left not one of them remaining.

 

10:15 Setelah pergi dari sana, bertemulah ia dengan aYonadab bin Rekhab yang datang menyongsong dia. Ia memberi salam kepadanya serta berkata: Apakah hatimu jujur kepadaku seperti hatiku terhadap engkau? Jawab Yonadab: Ya! Jika ya, berilah tanganmu! Maka diberinyalah tangannya, lalu Yehu mengajak dia naik ke sampingnya ke dalam kereta.

10:15 And when he departed from there, he came upon a Jehonadab the son of Rechab coming to meet him; and he greeted him and said to him, Is your heart right, as my heart is with your heart? And Jehonadab said, It is. And Jehu said, If it is, give me your hand. And he gave him his hand, and Jehu took him up to himself into the chariot.

 

10:16 Berkatalah Yehu: Marilah bersama-sama aku, supaya engkau melihat bagaimana agiatku untuk Tuhan. Demikianlah Yehu membawa dia dalam keretanya.

10:16 And he said, Come with me, and see my a zeal for Jehovah. So they made him ride in his chariot.

 

10:17 Setelah Yehu sampai di Samaria, maka ia membunuh semua orang yang masih tinggal dari keluarga aAhab di Samaria; ia memunahkannya, sesuai dengan firman yang diucapkan Tuhan kepada Elia.

10:17 And when he came to Samaria, he struck all who were left to a Ahab in Samaria, until he had destroyed him, according to the word of Jehovah, which He spoke to Elijah.

 

10:18 Kemudian Yehu mengumpulkan seluruh rakyat, lalu berkata kepada mereka: Adapun Ahab masih kurang beribadah kepada Baal, tetapi Yehu mau lebih hebat beribadah kepadanya.

10:18 And Jehu gathered all the people together and said to them, Ahab served Baal a little, but Jehu will serve him much.

 

 

 

 

10:19 Oleh sebab itu, panggillah menghadap aku semua anabi Baal, semua orang yang beribadah kepadanya dan semua imamnya, seorang pun tidak boleh tidak hadir, sebab aku hendak mempersembahkan kurban yang besar kepada Baal. Setiap orang yang tidak hadir tidak akan tinggal hidup. Tetapi perbuatan ini adalah akal Yehu supaya ia membinasakan orang-orang yang beribadah kepada Baal.

10:19 Now call to me all the a prophets of Baal, all his servants, and all his priests; let none be missing. For I have a great sacrifice to do to Baal. Whoever is missing will not live. But Jehu acted in subtlety, in order that he might destroy the worshippers of Baal.

 

10:20 Selanjutnya Yehu berkata: Tentukanlah hari raya perkumpulan kudus bagi Baal! Lalu mereka memaklumkannya.

10:20 And Jehu said, Sanctify a solemn assembly for Baal. And they proclaimed it.

 

10:21 Yehu mengirim orang ke seluruh Israel, maka datanglah seluruh orang yang beribadah kepada Baal, tidak seorang pun yang ketinggalan. Lalu masuklah semuanya ke dalam arumah Baal, sehingga rumah itu penuh sesak dari ujung ke ujung.

10:21 And Jehu sent word throughout all Israel, and all the worshippers of Baal came; and there was not one left who did not come. And they came to the house of Baal, and the a house of Baal was filled from one end to the other.

 

10:22 Kemudian berkatalah Yehu kepada orang yang mengepalai gudang pakaian: Keluarkanlah pakaian untuk setiap orang yang beribadah kepada Baal! Maka dikeluarkannyalah pakaian bagi mereka.

10:22 And he said to the one who was over the wardrobe, Bring out garments for all the worshippers of Baal. And he brought out the garments to them.

 

10:23 Sesudah itu masuklah Yehu dan Yonadab bin Rekhab ke dalam rumah Baal, lalu berkatalah ia kepada orang-orang penyembah Baal di situ: Periksalah dan lihatlah, supaya jangan ada di antara kamu di sini seorang pun dari hamba-hamba Tuhan, melainkan hanya orang-orang yang beribadah kepada Baal.

10:23 And Jehu and Jehonadab the son of Rechab came to the house of Baal; and he said to the worshippers of Baal, Search and see that none of the servants of Jehovah are here with you; only the worshippers of Baal should be here.

 

10:24 Lalu masuklah mereka untuk mempersembahkan kurban sembelihan dan kurban bakaran. Adapun Yehu telah menempatkan delapan puluh orang di luar dan telah berkata: Siapa yang membiarkan lolos seorang pun dari orang-orang yang kuserahkan ke dalam tanganmu, nyawanyalah ganti nyawa orang itu.

10:24 And they came to offer sacrifice and burnt offerings. Now Jehu had stationed for himself eighty men outside; and he had said, He who allows any of the men to escape whom I bring into your hands will give up his life instead.

 

10:25 Setelah Yehu selesai mempersembahkan kurban bakaran, berkatalah ia kepada bentara-bentara dan kepada perwira-perwira: Masuklah, bunuhlah mereka, seorang pun tidak boleh lolos! Maka dibunuhlah mereka dengan mata pedang, lalu mayatnya dibuang; kemudian masuklah bentara-bentara dan perwira-perwira itu ke 1gedung rumah Baal.

10:25 And when he finished offering the burnt offering, Jehu said to the guards and to the captains, Go in and slay them; let no one get out. And they struck them with the edge of the sword. And the guards and the captains threw them out, and they went to the 1 inner room of the house of Baal.

 

10:26 Mereka mengeluarkan tiang berhala rumah Baal itu, lalu dibakar.

10:26 And they brought out the pillars of the house of Baal and burned them.

 

10:27 Mereka merobohkan tugu berhala Baal itu, merobohkan juga rumah Baal, dan membuatnya menjadi jamban; begitulah sampai hari ini.

10:27 And they broke down the pillar of Baal, and broke down the house of Baal and made it a latrine, as it is to this day.

 

10:28 Demikianlah Yehu memunahkan Baal dari Israel.

10:28 Thus Jehu eradicated Baal from Israel.

 

10:29 Hanya, Yehu tidak menjauh dari dosa-dosa Yerobeam bin Nebat, yang mengakibatkan orang Israel aberdosa pula, yakni dosa penyembahan 1anak-anak lembu emas yang di Betel dan yang di Dan.

10:29 However as regards the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, 1 by which he caused Israel to a sin, Jehu did not turn away from them, that is, the 2 golden calves which were in Bethel and in Dan.

 

10:30 Berfirmanlah Tuhan kepada Yehu: 1Oleh karena engkau telah berbuat baik dengan melakukan apa yang benar di mata-Ku, dan telah berbuat kepada keluarga Ahab tepat seperti yang dikehendaki hati-Ku, maka anak-anakmu akan duduk di atas takhta Israel sampai keturunan yang akeempat.

10:30 And Jehovah said to Jehu, 1 Because you have done well in executing what is right in My eyes and have dealt with the house of Ahab according to all that was in My heart, your sons to the a fourth generation shall sit on the throne of Israel.

 

10:31 Tetapi Yehu tidak tetap hidup menurut hukum Tuhan, Allah Israel, dengan segenap hatinya; ia tidak menjauh dari dosa-dosa Yerobeam yang mengakibatkan orang Israel berdosa pula.

10:31 But Jehu was not careful to walk in the law of Jehovah the God of Israel with all his heart; he did not turn from the sins of Jeroboam, by which he caused Israel to sin.

 

10:32 Pada zaman itu mulailah Tuhan amenggunting daerah Israel, sebab bHazael mengalahkan mereka di seluruh daerah Israel

10:32 In those days Jehovah began to a cut away portions of land in Israel, and b Hazael struck them in all the borders of Israel

 

10:33 di sebelah timur sungai Yordan dengan merebut seluruh tanah aGilead, tanah orang Gad, orang Ruben dan orang Manasye, mulai dari Aror yang di tepi sungai Arnon, baik Gilead maupun Basan.

10:33 From the Jordan eastward, all the land of Gilead, the Gadites, the Reubenites, and the Manassites, from Aroer, which is by the valley of Arnon, both a Gilead and Bashan.

 

10:34 Selebihnya dari riwayat Yehu dan segala yang dilakukannya dan segala kepahlawanannya, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Israel?

10:34 And the rest of the acts of Jehu and all that he did and all his might, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?

 

10:35 Kemudian Yehu mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya, dan ia dikuburkan di Samaria, maka Yoahas, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

10:35 And Jehu slept with his fathers, and they buried him in Samaria. And Jehoahaz his son reigned in his place.

 

10:36 Adapun lamanya Yehu menjadi raja atas Israel di Samaria adalah dua puluh delapan tahun.

10:36 Now the time which Jehu reigned over Israel in Samaria was twenty-eight years.

 

 

 

 

2 RAJA-RAJA 11

2 KINGS 11

 

 

 

 

S. Kekuasaan Ilegal Atalya atas Yehuda

S. The illegitimate reign of Athaliah over Judah

 

11:1-16

11:1-16

 

 

 

 

11:1 aKetika bAtalya, ibu Ahazia, melihat bahwa anaknya sudah mati, maka bangkitlah ia membinasakan semua keturunan raja.

11:1 a Now when b Athaliah the mother of Ahaziah saw that her son was dead, she rose up and destroyed all the royal seed.

 

11:2 Tetapi Yoseba, anak perempuan raja Yoram, saudara perempuan Ahazia, mengambil aYoas bin Ahazia, menculik dia dari tengah-tengah anak-anak raja yang hendak dibunuh itu, 1memasukkan dia dengan inang penyusunya ke dalam gudang tempat tidur, dan menyembunyikan dia terhadap Atalya, sehingga dia tidak dibunuh.

11:2 But Jehosheba, the daughter of King Joram and sister of Ahaziah, took a Joash the son of Ahaziah and stole him away from among the sons of the king who were to be killed; 1 she put him and his nurse into the bedchamber. So they hid him from Athaliah, and he was not killed.

 

11:3 Maka tinggallah dia enam tahun lamanya bersama-sama perempuan itu dengan bersembunyi di rumah Tuhan, sementara Atalya memerintah negeri.

11:3 And he was with her, hidden in the house of Jehovah, for six years while Athaliah reigned over the land.

 

11:4 aDalam tahun yang ketujuh Yoyada mengundang para kepala pasukan seratus dari orang Kari dan dari pasukan bentara penunggu. Disuruhnyalah mereka datang kepadanya di rumah Tuhan, lalu diikatnya perjanjian dengan mereka dengan menyuruh mereka bersumpah di rumah Tuhan. Kemudian diperlihatkannyalah anak raja itu kepada mereka.

11:4 a Then in the seventh year Jehoiada sent word and gathered the captains of the hundreds over the Carites and over the guards and brought them to him at the house of Jehovah. And he made a covenant with them and put them under an oath in the house of Jehovah, then showed them the kings son.

 

11:5 Sesudah itu ia memerintahkan kepada mereka: Inilah yang harus kamu lakukan: sepertiga dari kamu, yakni yang selesai bertugas pada hari Sabat di sini, tetapi mengawal di istana raja,

11:5 And he commanded them, saying, This is the thing that you shall do: A third of you who come on duty on the Sabbath shall keep watch over the kings house;

 

11:6 sepertiga lagi ada di pintu gerbang Sur dan sepertiga pula di pintu gerbang di belakang para bentara penunggu - haruslah mengawal di istana;

11:6 And another third shall keep watch in the gate of Sur; and another third shall keep watch at the gate behind the guards. You shall keep watch over the house for a defense.

 

11:7 dan kedua regu dari pada kamu, yakni semua orang yang bertugas di sini pada hari Sabat dan mengawal di rumah Tuhan,

11:7 And the two divisions of you, all who go off duty on the Sabbath, shall keep watch over the house of Jehovah for the king.

 

11:8 haruslah mengelilingi raja dari segala penjuru, masing-masing dengan senjatanya di tangannya, dan siapa yang mendatangi barisan haruslah mati dibunuh. Dan baiklah kamu menyertai raja setiap kali ia keluar atau masuk.

11:8 And you shall surround the king, each man with his weapons in his hand; and whoever enters the ranks shall be put to death; and you shall be with the king in his goings and comings.

 

11:9 Para kepala pasukan seratus itu melakukan tepat seperti yang diperintahkan imam Yoyada. Masing-masing mengambil orang-orangnya yang selesai bertugas pada hari Sabat bersama-sama dengan orang-orang yang masuk bertugas pada hari itu, lalu datanglah mereka kepada imam Yoyada.

11:9 And the captains of the hundreds did according to all that Jehoiada the priest commanded them. And each took his men, those who came on duty on the Sabbath with those who went off duty on the Sabbath; and they came to Jehoiada the priest.

 

11:10 Imam memberikan kepada para kepala pasukan seratus itu tombak-tombak dan aperisai-perisai kepunyaan raja Daud yang ada di rumah Tuhan.

11:10 And the priest gave the spears and a shields that had belonged to King David, which were in the house of Jehovah, to the captains of the hundreds.

 

11:11 Kemudian para bentara itu, masing-masing dengan senjatanya di tangannya, mengambil tempatnya di lambung kanan sampai ke lambung kiri rumah itu, dengan mengelilingi mezbah dan rumah itu untuk melindungi raja.

11:11 And the guards stood, each man with his weapons in his hand, from the right flank of the house to the left flank of the house, by the altar and by the house, to guard the king all around.

 

11:12 Sesudah itu Yoyada membawa anak raja itu ke luar, mengenakan jejamang kepadanya dan memberikan hukum Allah kepadanya. Mereka menobatkan dia menjadi raja serta mengurapinya, dan sambil bertepuk tangan berserulah mereka: Hiduplah raja!

11:12 And he brought the kings son out and gave him the crown and the testimony. And they made him king and anointed him, and they clapped their hands and said, Long live the king!

 

11:13 Ketika Atalya mendengar suara bentara-bentara penunggu dan rakyat, pergilah ia mendapatkan rakyat itu ke dalam rumah Tuhan.

11:13 Now when Athaliah heard the noise of the guard and of the people, she went to the people at the house of Jehovah.

 

11:14 Lalu dilihatnyalah raja berdiri dekat atiang menurut kebiasaan, sedang para pemimpin dengan para pemegang nafiri ada dekat raja. Dan seluruh rakyat negeri bersukaria sambil meniup nafiri. Maka Atalya mengoyakkan pakaiannya sambil berseru: Khianat, khianat!

11:14 And she looked, and there was the king, standing by the a pillar, according to the custom, with captains and their trumpets near the king. And all the people of the land rejoiced and blew the trumpets. And Athaliah tore her clothes and cried out, Treason! Treason!

 

11:15 Tetapi imam Yoyada memerintahkan para kepala pasukan seratus, yakni orang-orang yang mengepalai tentara, katanya kepada mereka: Bawalah dia keluar dari barisan! Siapa yang memihak kepadanya bunuhlah dengan pedang! Sebab tadinya imam itu telah berkata: Janganlah ia dibunuh di rumah Tuhan!

11:15 And Jehoiada the priest commanded the captains of the hundreds who had been set over the army and said to them, Bring her out between the ranks, and anyone who follows her kill with a sword; for the priest said, She shall not be killed in the house of Jehovah.

 

11:16 Lalu mereka menangkap perempuan itu. Pada waktu ia masuk ke istana raja dengan melalui pintu bagi kuda, dibunuhlah dia di situ.

11:16 And they made way for her, and she went to the house of the king through the horses entrance and was killed there.

 

 

 

 

T. Kekuasaan Yoas (Yoahas) atas Yehuda

T. The reign of Joash (Jehoash) over Judah

 

11:17-12:21

11:17-12:21

 

 

 

 

11:17 Kemudian Yoyada mengikat aperjanjian antara Tuhan dengan raja dan rakyat, bahwa mereka menjadi umat Tuhan; juga antara raja dengan rakyat.

11:17 And Jehoiada made a a covenant between Jehovah and the king and the people that they would be Jehovahs people, and also between the king and the people.

 

11:18 Sesudah itu masuklah seluruh rakyat negeri ke arumah Baal, lalu merobohkannya; mereka memecahkan sama sekali mezbah-mezbahnya dan patung-patung dan membunuh Matan, imam Baal, di depan mezbah-mezbah itu. Kemudian imam Yoyada mengangkat penjaga-penjaga untuk rumah Tuhan.

11:18 And all the people of the land went to the a house of Baal and broke it down: The altars to him and his images they shattered to pieces, and they slew Mattan the priest of Baal before the altars. And the priest appointed officers over the house of Jehovah.

 

11:19 Sesudah itu ia mengajak para kepala pasukan seratus orang-orang Kari dan para bentara penunggu dan seluruh rakyat negeri, lalu mereka membawa raja turun dari rumah Tuhan; mereka masuk ke istana raja melalui pintu gerbang para bentara; kemudian duduklah raja di atas takhta kerajaan.

11:19 And 1 Jehoiada gathered the captains of the hundreds and the Carites and the guards and all the people of the land. And they brought the king down from the house of Jehovah and came by way of the guard gate to the house of the king, and he sat upon the throne of the kings.

 

11:20 Bersukarialah seluruh rakyat negeri dan amanlah kota itu, setelah Atalya mati dibunuh dengan pedang di istana raja.

11:20 And all the people of the land rejoiced, and the city was quiet; for they had slain Athaliah with the sword at the house of the king.

 

11:21 aYoas berumur tujuh tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja.

11:21 1a Jehoash was seven years old when he began to reign.

 

 

 

 

2 RAJA-RAJA 12

2 KINGS 12

 

 

 

 

12:1 Dalam tahun ketujuh zaman Yehu, Yoas menjadi raja dan empat puluh tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Nama ibunya ialah Zibya, dari Bersyeba.

12:1 In the seventh year of Jehu, Jehoash began to reign; and he reigned forty years in Jerusalem. And his mothers name was Zibiah of Beer-sheba.

 

12:2 Yoas melakukan apa yang benar di mata Tuhan seumur hidupnya, selama imam Yoyada mengajar dia.

12:2 And Jehoash did what was right in the sight of Jehovah all the days in which Jehoiada the priest instructed him.

 

12:3 Namun demikian, 1bukit-bukit pengorbanan atidaklah dijauhkan. Bangsa itu masih mempersembahkan dan membakar kurban di bukit-bukit itu.

12:3 However the 1 high places were a not removed; the people still sacrificed and burned incense in the high places.

 

12:4 Berkatalah Yoas kepada para imam: Segala auang yang dibawa ke dalam rumah Tuhan sebagai persembahan kudus, yakni uang masuk untuk pencatatan jiwa, uang tebusan jiwa menurut penilaian yang berlaku untuk seseorang, dan segala uang yang dibawa ke dalam rumah Tuhan karena dorongan hati seseorang,

12:4 And Jehoash said to the priests, All the money of the sanctified things which goes into the house of Jehovahthe a money of everyone who passes through the numbering, the money of each persons assessment, and all the money that comes up in the heart of anyone to bring into the house of Jehovah

 

12:5 baiklah para imam sendiri menerimanya, masing-masing dari kenalannya, dan memakainya untuk memperbaiki yang rusak pada rumah itu, di mana saja terdapat kerusakan.

12:5 Let the priests take, each man from his acquaintance; and they shall repair what is broken in the house, wherever anything is found broken.

 

12:6 Tetapi dalam tahun kedua puluh tiga zaman raja Yoas para imam belum juga memperbaiki kerusakan rumah itu.

12:6 But as of the twenty-third year of King Jehoash, the priests had not repaired what was broken in the house.

 

12:7 Sebab itu raja Yoas memanggil imam Yoyada, dan imam-imam lain serta berkata kepada mereka: Mengapa kamu tidak perbaiki kerusakan rumah itu? Maka sekarang, tidak boleh lagi kamu menerima uang dari kenalan-kenalanmu, tetapi serahkanlah itu untuk memperbaiki kerusakan rumah itu.

12:7 So King Jehoash summoned Jehoiada the priest and the priests and said to them, Why have you not been repairing what is broken in the house? Now therefore take no more money from your acquaintances, but deliver it for what is broken in the house.

 

12:8 Lalu setujulah para imam itu untuk tidak menerima uang dari rakyat, tetapi mereka pun tidak usah lagi memperbaiki kerusakan rumah itu.

12:8 And the priests agreed that they would neither take money from the people nor repair what was broken in the house.

 

12:9 Kemudian imam Yoyada mengambil sebuah peti, membuat lobang pada tutupnya dan amenaruhnya di samping mezbah, di sebelah kanan apabila orang masuk ke rumah Tuhan. Para imam penjaga pintu menaruh ke dalamnya segala uang yang dibawa orang ke dalam rumah Tuhan.

12:9 Then Jehoiada the priest took a chest and bored a hole in its lid, and he a put it beside the altar, on the right side as one comes into the house of Jehovah. And the priests who guarded the threshold put all the money that came into the house of Jehovah into it.

 

12:10 Dan apabila dilihat mereka bahwa sudah banyak uang dalam peti itu, maka datanglah panitera raja beserta imam besar, lalu membungkus dan amenghitung uang yang terdapat dalam rumah Tuhan itu.

12:10 And whenever they saw that there was a large amount of money in the chest, the kings scribe and the high priest would go up and bind the money that came into the house of Jehovah in bags and a count it.

 

12:11 Mereka menyerahkan jumlah uang yang ditentukan ke tangan apara pekerja yang diangkat mengawasi rumah Tuhan, dan mereka ini membayarkannya kepada tukang-tukang kayu, kepada tukang-tukang bangunan yang mengerjakan rumah Tuhan itu,

12:11 And they would give the money that was weighed out into the hands of those who a did the work, who had the oversight of the house of Jehovah; and these would pay it out to the carpenters and the builders who worked on the house of Jehovah,

 

12:12 kepada tukang-tukang tembok dan kepada tukang-tukang pemahat batu; mereka memakainya juga bagi pembelian kayu dan batu pahat untuk memperbaiki rumah Tuhan dan bagi segala pengeluaran untuk memperbaiki rumah itu.

12:12 And to the masons and to the stone hewers and for the purchase of timber and hewn stone, to repair what was broken in the house of Jehovah, and for any other outlay to repair the house.

 

12:13 Tetapi untuk rumah Tuhan tidaklah dibuat pasu perak, pisau, bokor penyiraman, nafiri, atau sesuatu perkakas emas dan perak dari uang yang telah dibawa ke dalam rumah Tuhan itu.

12:13 But there were no cups of silver, snuffers, basins, trumpets, or any vessels of gold or any vessels of silver prepared for the house of Jehovah out of the money that was brought into the house of Jehovah;

 

12:14 Melainkan mereka menyerahkannya kepada para pekerja, supaya dipakai memperbaiki rumah Tuhan.

12:14 For they gave it all to those who did the work, who repaired the house of Jehovah with it.

 

12:15 Mereka kemudian tidak mengadakan perhitungan dengan orang-orang yang diserahi uang itu untuk memberikannya kepada tukang-tukang, sebab mereka bekerja dengan jujur.

12:15 And they did not ask for an accounting from the men into whose hands they had given the money to use for doing the work, for these worked faithfully.

 

12:16 Tetapi uang akurban penebus salah dan uang kurban penghapus dosa tidaklah dibawa ke dalam rumah Tuhan; semuanya itu adalah bagian bpara imam.

12:16 The money from the a trespass offerings and the money from the sin offerings was not brought into the house of Jehovah; it was the b priests.

 

12:17 aPada waktu itu majulah bHazael, raja Aram, diperanginyalah Gat dan direbutnya. Kemudian Hazael berniat menyerang Yerusalem,

12:17 a At that time b Hazael the king of Syria went up and fought against Gath and took it. And Hazael set his face to go up toward Jerusalem.

 

12:18 tetapi Yoas, raja Yehuda, mengambil segala persembahan kudus yang telah dikuduskan oleh para leluhurnya yakni Yosafat, Yoram dan Ahazia, raja-raja Yehuda, dan persembahan-persembahan kudusnya sendiri, juga segala emas yang terdapat dalam perbendaharaan arumah Tuhan dan istana raja. Dikirimkannyalah semuanya itu kepada Hazael, raja Aram, maka tidak jadi lagi Hazael menyerang Yerusalem.

12:18 And Jehoash the king of Judah took all the sanctified things which Jehoshaphat and Jehoram and Ahaziah, his fathers the kings of Judah, had sanctified and his own sanctified things and all the gold that was found in the treasuries of the a house of Jehovah and the house of the king; and he sent it to Hazael the king of Syria. And he went up from Jerusalem.

 

12:19 Selebihnya dari riwayat Yoas dan segala yang dilakukannya, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Yehuda?

12:19 And the rest of the acts of Joash and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

 

12:20 aPegawai-pegawainya bangkit mengadakan persepakatan, lalu membunuh Yoas di rumah Milo yang letaknya di penurunan ke Sila.

12:20 a And his servants rose up and formed a conspiracy. And they struck Joash down in the house of Millo, on the way that leads down to Silla.

 

12:21 Yozakar, anak Simeat, dan Yozabad, anak Somer, ialah pegawai-pegawainya yang amembunuh dia. Lalu ia dikuburkan di samping nenek moyangnya di kota Daud, maka Amazia, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

12:21 And it was Jozacar the son of Shimeath and Jehozabad the son of Shomer, his servants, who a struck him down; and he died. And they buried him with his fathers in the city of David. And Amaziah his son reigned in his place.

 

 

 

 

2 RAJA-RAJA 13

2 KINGS 13

 

 

 

 

U. Kekuasaan Yoahas atas Israel

U. The reign of Jehoahaz over Israel

 

13:1-9a

13:1-9a

 

13:1 Dalam tahun kedua puluh tiga zaman Yoas bin Ahazia, raja Yehuda, Yoahas, anak Yehu, menjadi raja atas Israel di Samaria; ia memerintah tujuh belas tahun lamanya.

13:1 In the twenty-third year of Jehoash the son of Ahaziah, the king of Judah, Jehoahaz the son of Jehu began to reign over Israel in Samaria; he reigned seventeen years.

 

13:2 Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata Tuhan, dan ia hidup menuruti dosa Yerobeam bin Nebat, yang mengakibatkan orang Israel aberdosa pula. Ia tidak menjauhinya.

13:2 And he did what was evil in the sight of Jehovah and followed after the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat 1 by which he caused Israel to a sin; he did not turn away from them.

 

13:3 Sebab itu bangkitlah murka Tuhan terhadap Israel, lalu diserahkan-Nyalah mereka ke dalam tangan aHazael, raja Aram, dan ke dalam tangan bBenhadad, anak Hazael, selama zaman itu.

13:3 And the anger of Jehovah was kindled against Israel; and He gave them continually into the hand of a Hazael the king of Syria and into the hand of b Ben-hadad the son of Hazael.

 

13:4 Tetapi kemudian Yoahas memohon belas kasihan Tuhan, dan Tuhan mendengarkan dia, sebab Ia telah amelihat, bagaimana beratnya orang Israel ditindas oleh raja Aram.

13:4 (And Jehoahaz entreated Jehovah; and Jehovah listened to him, for He a saw the oppression of Israel, for the king of Syria oppressed them.

 

13:5 - Tuhan memberikan kepada orang Israel seorang penolong, sehingga mereka lepas dari tangan Aram dan dapat duduk di kemah-kemah mereka seperti yang sudah-sudah.

13:5 And Jehovah gave Israel a deliverer, and they went out from under the hand of Syria; and the children of Israel dwelt in their tents as they had before.

 

13:6 Hanya mereka tidak menjauh dari dosa-dosa keluarga Yerobeam, yang mengakibatkan orang Israel berdosa pula, melainkan mereka terus hidup dalam dosa itu. Juga patung 1Asyera masih berdiri di Samaria.

13:6 However they did not depart from the sins of the house of Jeroboam, by which he caused Israel to sin, but walked in them. And also the 1 Asherah remained standing in Samaria.)

 

13:7 Sebab tidak ada laskar ditinggalkan pada Yoahas, selain dari lima puluh orang berkuda dan sepuluh kereta dan sepuluh ribu orang berjalan kaki, sebab raja Aram telah membinasakan mereka dan meniupkan mereka seperti abu pengirikan.

13:7 For he left to Jehoahaz of the people not more than fifty horsemen and ten chariots and ten thousand foot soldiers, for the king of Syria destroyed them and made them like the dust at threshing.

 

13:8 Selebihnya dari riwayat Yoahas dan segala yang dilakukannya dan kepahlawanannya, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Israel?

13:8 And the rest of the acts of Jehoahaz and all that he did and his might, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?

 

13:9a Kemudian Yoahas mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya, dan ia dikuburkan di Samaria.

13:9a And Jehoahaz slept with his fathers, and they buried him in Samaria.

 

 

 

 

V. Kekuasaan Yoahas (Yoas) atas Israel

V. The reign of Jehoash (Joash) over Israel

 

13:9b-25

13:9b-25

 

 

 

 

13:9b Maka Yoas, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

13:9b And Joash his son reigned in his place.

 

13:10 Dalam tahun ketiga puluh tujuh zaman Yoas, raja Yehuda, Yoas anak Yoahas, menjadi raja atas Israel di Samaria. Ia memerintah enam belas tahun lamanya.

13:10 In the thirty-seventh year of 1 Joash the king of Judah, 2 Jehoash the son of Jehoahaz began to reign over Israel in Samaria; he reigned sixteen years.

 

13:11 Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata Tuhan. Ia tidak menjauh dari segala dosa yang disuruh Yerobeam bin Nebat dilakukan orang Israel, tetapi terus hidup dalam dosa itu.

13:11 And he did what was evil in the sight of Jehovah; he did not turn away from all the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, by which he caused Israel to sin; he walked in them.

 

13:12 aSelebihnya dari riwayat Yoas dan segala yang dilakukannya dan kepahlawanannya, bagaimana ia berperang melawan bAmazia, raja Yehuda, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Israel?

13:12 a And the rest of the acts of Joash and all that he did and his might with which he fought with b Amaziah the king of Judah, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?

 

13:13 Setelah Yoas mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya, maka duduklah Yerobeam di atas takhta ayahnya. Dan Yoas dikuburkan di Samaria di samping raja Israel.

13:13 And Joash slept with his fathers; and Jeroboam sat upon his throne. And Joash was buried in Samaria with the kings of Israel.

 

13:14 Ketika Elisa menderita 1sakit yang menyebabkan kematiannya, datanglah Yoas, raja Israel, kepadanya dan menangis oleh karena dia, katanya: Bapaku, bapaku! aKereta Israel dan orang-orangnya yang berkuda!

13:14 Now when Elisha was 1 ill with his illness by which he eventually died, Joash the king of Israel went down to him and wept over him and said, My father! My father! The a chariots of Israel and its horsemen!

 

13:15 Berkatalah Elisa kepadanya: Ambillah busur dan anak-anak panah! Lalu diambillah busur dan anak-anak panah.

13:15 And Elisha said to him, Take a bow and arrows; and he took a bow and arrows to him.

 

13:16 Berkatalah ia kepada raja Israel: Tariklah busurmu! Lalu ia menarik busurnya, tetapi Elisa menaruh tangannya di atas tangan raja,

13:16 And he said to the king of Israel, Grasp the bow; and he grasped the bow. And Elisha put his hands over the hands of the king,

 

13:17 serta berkata: Bukalah jendela yang di sebelah timur! Dan ketika dibukanya, berkatalah Elisa: Panahlah! Lalu dipanahnya. Kemudian berkatalah Elisa: Itulah anak panah 1kemenangan dari pada Tuhan, anak panah kemenangan terhadap Aram. Engkau akan mengalahkan Aram di Afek sampai habis lenyap.

13:17 And he said, Open the window toward the east; and he opened it. And Elisha said, Shoot; and he shot. And he said, Jehovahs arrow of 1 victory, an arrow of victory against Syria; for you will strike Syria in Aphek until you have consumed it.

 

13:18 Sesudah itu berkatalah ia: Ambillah anak-anak panah itu! Lalu diambilnya. Setelah diambilnya, berkatalah Elisa kepada raja Israel: Pukulkanlah itu ke tanah! Lalu dipukulkannya tiga kali, kemudian ia berhenti.

13:18 And he said, Take the arrows; and he took them. And he said to the king of Israel, Strike the ground; and he struck the ground three times then stopped.

 

13:19 Tetapi gusarlah abdi Allah itu kepadanya serta berkata: Seharusnya engkau memukul lima atau enam kali! Dengan berbuat demikian engkau akan memukul Aram sampai habis lenyap. Tetapi sekarang, hanya atiga kali saja engkau akan memukul Aram.

13:19 And the man of God became angry with him and said, You should have struck it five or six times; then you would have struck Syria until you had consumed them. But now you shall strike Syria only a three times.

 

13:20 Sesudah itu matilah Elisa, lalu ia dikuburkan. Adapun gerombolan Moab sering memasuki negeri itu pada pergantian tahun.

13:20 And Elisha died, and they buried him. Now the bands of the Moabites would invade the land at the coming in of the new year.

 

13:21 Pada suatu kali orang sedang menguburkan mayat. Ketika mereka melihat gerombolan datang, dicampakkan merekalah mayat itu ke dalam kubur Elisa, lalu pergi. Dan demi mayat itu 1kena kepada tulang-tulang Elisa, maka ahiduplah ia kembali dan bangun berdiri.

13:21 And it so happened that as the people were burying a man, they saw a band; and they cast the man into the grave of Elisha. And as soon as the man 1 touched the bones of Elisha, he a came to life and stood up on his feet.

 

13:22 Hazael, raja Aram, menindas orang Israel sepanjang umur Yoahas.

13:22 And Hazael the king of Syria oppressed Israel all the days of Jehoahaz.

 

13:23 Tetapi Tuhan mengasihani serta menyayangi mereka, dan Ia berpaling kepada mereka oleh karena aperjanjian-Nya dengan Abraham, Ishak dan Yakub, jadi Ia tidak mau memusnahkan mereka dan belum membuang mereka pada waktu itu dari hadapan-Nya.

13:23 But Jehovah was gracious to them and had compassion on them and turned to them because of His a covenant with Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, and He would not destroy them; and He has not cast them from His presence until now.

 

13:24 Kemudian matilah Hazael, raja Aram, maka Benhadad, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

13:24 And Hazael the king of Syria died, and Ben-hadad his son reigned in his place.

 

13:25 Yoas bin Yoahas merebut kembali dari tangan Benhadad bin Hazael kota-kota yang dalam peperangan direbut aBenhadad dari tangan Yoahas, ayah Yoas. bTiga kali Yoas mengalahkan dia dan cmendapat kembali kota-kota Israel.

13:25 And Jehoash the son of Jehoahaz retook the cities out of the hand of a Ben-hadad the son of Hazael that he had taken in war out of the hand of Jehoahaz his father; Joash struck him b three times and c recovered the cities of Israel.

 

 

 

 

2 RAJA-RAJA 14

2 KINGS 14

 

 

 

 

W. Kekuasaan Amazia atas Yehuda

W. The reign of Amaziah over Judah

 

14:1-22

14:1-22

 

 

 

 

14:1 aDalam tahun kedua zaman Yoas bin Yoahas, raja Israel, bAmazia, anak Yoas raja Yehuda menjadi raja.

14:1 a In the second year of Joash the son of 1 Joahaz, the king of Israel, b Amaziah the son of Joash, the king of Judah, began to reign.

 

14:2 Ia berumur dua puluh lima tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan dua puluh sembilan tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Nama ibunya ialah Yoadan, dari Yerusalem.

14:2 He was twenty-five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned in Jerusalem for twenty-nine years; and his mothers name was Jehoaddin of Jerusalem.

 

14:3 Ia melakukan apa yang benar di mata Tuhan, hanya bukan seperti Daud, bapa leluhurnya. Ia berbuat tepat seperti yang diperbuat Yoas, ayahnya.

14:3 And he did what was right in the sight of Jehovah, yet not like David his father; he did according to all that Joash his father had done.

 

14:4 Namun demikian, bukit-bukit pengorbanan atidaklah dijauhkan. Bangsa itu masih mempersembahkan dan membakar kurban di bukit-bukit itu.

14:4 However the high places were a not removed; the people still sacrificed and burned incense in the high places.

 

14:5 Segera sesudah kuasa kerajaan itu kokoh di tangannya, dibunuhnyalah pegawai-pegawainya yang telah amembunuh raja, yaitu ayahnya.

14:5 And when the kingdom was established in his hand, he struck down his servants who had a struck down his father the king.

 

14:6 Tetapi anak-anak para pembunuh itu tidak dihukum mati olehnya, seperti yang tertulis dalam kitab Taurat Musa, di mana Tuhan telah memberi perintah: Janganlah aayah dihukum mati karena anaknya, janganlah juga anak dihukum mati karena ayahnya, melainkan setiap orang harus dihukum mati karena dosanya sendiri.

14:6 But the children of the murderers he did not put to death, as it is written in the book of the law of Moses, in which Jehovah commanded, saying, a Fathers shall not be put to death because of their children, nor shall children be put to death because of their fathers; but every man shall be put to death for his own sin.

 

14:7 aIa mengalahkan Edom di Lembah Asin, sepuluh ribu orang banyaknya, dan merebut Sela dalam peperangan itu, lalu dinamainyalah kota itu Yokteel; begitulah sampai hari ini.

14:7 a He struck ten thousand of Edom in the Valley of Salt; and he captured Sela in battle and called the name of it Joktheel, as it is to this day.

 

14:8 aPada waktu itu Amazia menyuruh utusan kepada Yoas bin Yoahas bin Yehu, raja Israel, mengatakan: Mari kita mengadu tenaga!

14:8 a Then Amaziah sent messengers to Jehoash the son of Jehoahaz the son of Jehu, the king of Israel, saying, Come, let us confront each other.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

14:9 Tetapi Yoas, raja Israel, menyuruh orang kepada Amazia, raja Yehuda, amengatakan: Rumput duri yang di gunung Libanon mengirim pesan kepada pohon aras yang di gunung Libanon, bunyinya: Berikanlah anakmu perempuan kepada anakku laki-laki menjadi isterinya. Tetapi binatang-binatang hutan yang ada di gunung Libanon itu berjalan lewat dari sana, lalu menginjak rumput duri itu.

14:9 And Jehoash the king of Israel sent word to Amaziah the king of Judah, a saying, The thornbush that was in Lebanon sent word to the cedar that was in Lebanon, saying, Give your daughter to my son as his wife; but a wild beast that was in Lebanon passed by and trampled the thornbush.

 

14:10 Memang engkau telah mengalahkan Edom, sebab itu engkau menjadi atinggi hati. Cukuplah bagimu mendapat kehormatan itu dan tinggallah di rumahmu. Untuk apa engkau menantang malapetaka, sehingga engkau jatuh dan Yehuda bersama-sama engkau?

14:10 You have surely struck Edom, and your heart has a lifted you up. Glorify yourself, but remain in your home. Why should you stir up trouble so that you and Judah with you fall?

 

14:11 Tetapi Amazia tidak mau mendengarkan, sebab itu majulah Yoas, raja Israel, lalu mengadu tenagalah mereka, ia dan Amazia, raja Yehuda, di Bet-Semes yang termasuk wilayah Yehuda.

14:11 But Amaziah would not listen; so Jehoash the king of Israel went up, and he and Amaziah the king of Judah confronted each other in Beth-shemesh, which belongs to Judah.

 

14:12 Yehuda terpukul kalah oleh Israel, sehingga masing-masing lari ke kemahnya.

14:12 And Judah was defeated before Israel, and they fled, each man to his tent.

 

14:13 Yoas, raja Israel menangkap Amazia, raja Yehuda, anak Yoas bin Ahazia, di Bet-Semes. Lalu Yoas masuk ke Yerusalem, dan membongkar tembok Yerusalem dari aPintu Gerbang Efraim sampai ke bPintu Gerbang Sudut, empat ratus hasta panjangnya.

14:13 And Jehoash the king of Israel captured Amaziah the king of Judah the son of Jehoash the son of Ahaziah in Beth-shemesh; and he came to Jerusalem and tore down the wall of Jerusalem from the a gate of Ephraim to the b Corner Gate, four hundred cubits.

 

14:14 Sesudah itu ia mengambil segala emas dan perak dan segala perkakas yang terdapat dalam arumah Tuhan dan dalam perbendaharaan istana raja, juga orang-orang sandera, kemudian pulanglah ia ke Samaria.

14:14 And he took all the gold and silver and all the vessels that were found in the a house of Jehovah and in the treasuries of the kings house as well as hostages, and returned to Samaria.

 

14:15 aSelebihnya dari riwayat Yoas, apa yang dilakukannya dan kepahlawanannya dan bagaimana ia berperang melawan Amazia, raja Yehuda, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Israel?

14:15 a And the rest of the acts of Jehoash which he did and his might and how he fought with Amaziah the king of Judah, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?

 

14:16 Kemudian Yoas mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya, dan ia dikuburkan di Samaria di samping raja-raja Israel. Maka Yerobeam, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

14:16 And Jehoash slept with his fathers and was buried in Samaria with the kings of Israel. And Jeroboam his son reigned in his place.

 

14:17 aAmazia bin Yoas, raja Yehuda, masih hidup lima belas tahun lamanya sesudah matinya Yoas bin Yoahas, raja Israel.

14:17 a And Amaziah the son of Joash, the king of Judah, lived for fifteen years after the death of Jehoash the son of Jehoahaz, the king of Israel.

 

14:18 Selebihnya dari riwayat Amazia, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Yehuda?

14:18 And the rest of the acts of Amaziah, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

 

14:19 Di Yerusalem orang mengadakan persepakatan melawan dia, sebab itu larilah ia ke Lakhis. Tetapi mereka menyuruh mengejar dia ke Lakhis, lalu dibunuhlah dia di sana.

14:19 And they formed a conspiracy against him in Jerusalem, and he fled to Lachish; and they sent men after him to Lachish, and they killed him there.

 

14:20 Diangkutlah dia dengan kuda, lalu dikuburkan di Yerusalem di samping nenek moyangnya di kota Daud.

14:20 And they brought him on horses, and he was buried in Jerusalem with his fathers in the city of David.

 

14:21 Segenap bangsa Yehuda mengambil 1Azarya, yang masih berumur enam belas tahun dan mengangkat dia menjadi raja menggantikan ayahnya, Amazia.

14:21 And all the people of Judah took 1 Azariah, who was sixteen years old, and made him king in place of his father Amaziah.

 

14:22 Ia memperkuat Elat dan mengembalikannya kepada Yehuda, sesudah raja mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya.

14:22 It was he who built Elath and restored it to Judah after Amaziah the king slept with his fathers.

 

 

 

 

X. Kekuasaan Yerobeam atas Israel

X. The reign of Jeroboam over Israel

 

14:23-29

14:23-29

 

 

 

 

14:23 Dalam tahun kelima belas zaman Amazia bin Yoas, raja Yehuda, Yerobeam, anak Yoas, raja Israel, menjadi raja di Samaria. Ia memerintah empat puluh satu tahun lamanya.

14:23 In the fifteenth year of Amaziah the son of Joash, the king of Judah, Jeroboam the son of Joash, the king of Israel, began to reign in Samaria; he reigned forty-one years.

 

14:24 Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata Tuhan. Ia tidak menjauh dari segala dosa Yerobeam bin Nebat, yang mengakibatkan orang Israel aberdosa pula.

14:24 And he did what was evil in the sight of Jehovah; he did not turn away from all the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, 1 by which he caused Israel to a sin.

 

14:25 Ia amengembalikan daerah Israel, dari jalan masuk ke Hamat sampai ke 1Laut Araba sesuai dengan firman Tuhan, Allah Israel, yang telah diucapkan-Nya dengan perantaraan hamba-Nya, bnabi Yunus bin Amitai dari Gat-Hefer.

14:25 He a restored the border of Israel from the entrance of Hamath to the 1 sea of the Arabah, according to the word of Jehovah the God of Israel, which He spoke through His servant b Jonah the son of Amittai, the prophet who was of Gath-hepher.

 

14:26 Sebab Tuhan telah amelihat betapa pahitnya kesengsaraan orang Israel itu: sudah habis lenyap baik yang tinggi maupun yang rendah kedudukannya, dan tidak ada penolong bagi orang Israel.

14:26 For Jehovah a saw the affliction of Israel, that it was very bitter, for there was neither bond nor free left, nor was there anyone to help Israel.

 

14:27 Tetapi Tuhan tidak mengatakan bahwa Ia akan menghapuskan nama Israel dari kolong langit; jadi Ia menolong mereka dengan perantaraan Yerobeam bin Yoas.

14:27 And Jehovah did not say that He would blot out the name of Israel from under heaven but saved them by the hand of Jeroboam the son of Joash.

 

14:28 Selebihnya dari riwayat Yerobeam dan segala yang dilakukannya dan kepahlawanannya, bagaimana ia berperang, dan bagaimana ia mengembalikan aDamsyik dan Hamat-Yehuda ke dalam Israel, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Israel?

14:28 And the rest of the acts of Jeroboam and all that he did and his might, how he warred and how he restored for Israel a Damascus and Hamath, which had belonged to Judah, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?

 

14:29 Kemudian Yerobeam mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya, raja-raja Israel. Maka Zakharia, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

14:29 And Jeroboam slept with his fathers, with the kings of Israel. And Zechariah his son reigned in his place.

 

 

 

 

2 RAJA-RAJA 15

2 KINGS 15

 

 

 

 

Y. Kekuasaan Azarya (Uzia) atas Yehuda

Y. The reign of Azariah (Uzziah) over Judah

 

15:1-7

15:1-7

 

 

 

 

15:1 Dalam tahun kedua puluh tujuh zaman Yerobeam, raja Israel, 1aAzarya, anak Amazia raja Yehuda menjadi raja.

15:1 In the twenty-seventh year of Jeroboam the king of Israel, 1a Azariah the son of Amaziah, the king of Judah, began to reign.

 

15:2 aIa berumur enam belas tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan lima puluh dua tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Nama ibunya ialah Yekholya, dari Yerusalem.

15:2 a He was sixteen years old when he began to reign, and he reigned fifty-two years in Jerusalem; and his mothers name was Jecoliah of Jerusalem.

 

15:3 Ia melakukan apa yang benar di mata Tuhan, tepat seperti yang dilakukan Amazia, ayahnya.

15:3 And he did what was right in the sight of Jehovah, according to all that his father Amaziah had done.

 

15:4 Namun demikian, bukit-bukit pengorbanan atidaklah dijauhkan. Bangsa itu masih mempersembahkan dan membakar kurban di bukit-bukit itu.

15:4 However the high places were a not removed; the people still sacrificed and burned incense in the high places.

 

15:5 aMaka Tuhan menimpakan tulah kepada raja, sehingga ia 1sakit kusta sampai hari kematiannya, dan tinggal dalam sebuah rumah bpengasingan. Dan Yotam, anak raja, mengepalai istana dan menjalankan pemerintahan atas rakyat negeri itu.

15:5 a And Jehovah struck the king, so that he was a 1 leper until the day of his death; and he dwelt in a b separate house. And Jotham, the kings son, was over the household, judging the people of the land.

 

15:6 Selebihnya dari riwayat Azarya, dan segala yang dilakukannya, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Yehuda?

15:6 And the rest of the acts of Azariah and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

 

15:7 Kemudian Azarya mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya, dan ia dikuburkan di samping nenek moyangnya di kota Daud. Maka Yotam, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

15:7 And Azariah slept with his fathers, and they buried him with his fathers in the city of David. And Jotham his son reigned in his place.

 

 

 

 

Z. Kekuasaan Zakharia atas Israel

Z. The reign of Zechariah over Israel

 

15:8-12

15:8-12

 

 

 

 

15:8 Dalam tahun ketiga puluh delapan zaman Azarya, raja Yehuda, Zakharia, anak Yerobeam, menjadi raja atas Israel di Samaria. Ia memerintah enam bulan lamanya.

15:8 In the thirty-eighth year of Azariah the king of Judah, Zechariah the son of Jeroboam began to reign over Israel in Samaria; he reigned six months.

 

15:9 Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata Tuhan seperti yang telah dilakukan oleh nenek moyangnya. Ia tidak menjauh dari dosa-dosa Yerobeam bin Nebat, yang mengakibatkan orang Israel aberdosa pula.

15:9 And he did what was evil in the sight of Jehovah, as his fathers had done; he did not turn away from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, 1 by which he caused Israel to a sin.

 

15:10 Salum bin Yabesh mengikat persepakatan melawan dia, amembunuh dia di Yibleam, kemudian menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

15:10 And Shallum the son of Jabesh conspired against him and a struck him down before the people. So he killed him and reigned in his place.

 

15:11 Selebihnya dari riwayat Zakharia, sesungguhnya semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Israel.

15:11 And the rest of the acts of Zechariah are there written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel.

 

15:12 Bukankah begini firman Tuhan yang diucapkan-Nya kepada Yehu: Anak-anakmu sampai kepada keturunan yang akeempat akan duduk di atas takhta Israel! Dan terjadilah demikian.

15:12 This was the word of Jehovah which He spoke to Jehu, saying, Your sons to the a fourth generation shall sit on the throne of Israel; and it was so.

15:13-15

15:13 Shallum the son of Jabesh began to reign in the thirty-ninth year of 1 Uzziah the king of Judah, and he reigned one month in Samaria.

 

15:14 Sesudah itu majulah Menahem bin Gadi dari aTirza, lalu sampai ke Samaria. Ia membunuh Salum bin Yabesh di Samaria, kemudian menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

15:14 And Menahem the son of Gadi went up from a Tirzah and came to Samaria. And he struck down Shallum the son of Jabesh in Samaria and killed him. And he reigned in his place.

15:16 Then Menahem struck Tiphsah and all who were in it and its borders from Tirzah; because they did not open to him, he struck it; all its pregnant women he ripped open.

 

15:17 Dalam tahun ketiga puluh sembilan zaman Azarya, raja Yehuda, Menahem bin Gadi menjadi raja atas Israel. Ia memerintah sepuluh tahun lamanya di Samaria.

15:18 Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata Tuhan. Sepanjang umurnya ia tidak menjauh dari dosa-dosa Yerobeam bin Nebat, yang mengakibatkan orang Israel berdosa pula.

15:18 And he did what was evil in the sight of Jehovah; he did not turn away from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, by which he caused Israel to sin, throughout all his days.

 

15:19 aPul, raja Asyur, datang menyerang negeri itu, lalu Menahem memberi seribu talenta perak kepada Pul, supaya dibantunya dia mengokohkan kerajaan itu di tangannya.

15:19 a Pul the king of Assyria came against the land, and Menahem gave Pul a thousand talents of silver so that he would support his efforts to keep the kingdom in his hand.

 

15:20 Menahem mengeluarkan uang ini atas beban Israel dan atas beban semua orang yang kaya raya untuk diberikan kepada raja Asyur: lima puluh syikal perak dari setiap orang. Lalu pulanglah raja Asyur dan ia tidak tinggal di sana, di negeri itu.

15:20 And Menahem exacted the money from Israel, from all the great men of wealth, each one man giving fifty shekels of silver, so that he could give it to the king of Assyria. And the king of Assyria returned and did not stay there in the land.

 

15:21 Selebihnya dari riwayat Menahem dan segala yang dilakukannya, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Israel?

15:21 And the rest of the acts of Menahem and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?

15:25 And Pekah the son of Remaliah, his captain, conspired against him. And he struck him down, along with Argob and Arieh, in Samaria in the citadel of the kings house; and with him were fifty men from among the Gileadites. So he killed him and reigned in his place.

15:27 In the fifty-second year of Azariah the king of Judah, Pekah the son of Remaliah began to reign over Israel in Samaria; he reigned twenty years.

 

15:28 Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata Tuhan. Ia tidak menjauh dari dosa-dosa Yerobeam bin Nebat, yang mengakibatkan orang Israel berdosa pula.

15:28 And he did what was evil in the sight of Jehovah; he did not turn away from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, by which he caused Israel to sin.

 

15:29 Dalam zaman Pekah, raja Israel, datanglah aTiglat-Pileser, raja Asyur; direbutnyalah Iyon, Abel-Bet-Maakha, Yanoah, Kedesh dan Hazor, Gilead dan Galilea, seluruh tanah bNaftali, lalu diangkutnyalah penduduknya ke Asyur ke dalam pembuangan.

15:29 In the days of Pekah the king of Israel a Tiglath-pileser the king of Assyria came and took Ijon and Abel-beth-maacah and Janoah and Kedesh and Hazor and Gilead and Galilee, all the land of b Naphtali; and he carried them away captive to Assyria.

 

15:30 aHosea bin Ela mengadakan persepakatan melawan Pekah bin Remalya; dibunuhnyalah dia, kemudian dia menjadi raja menggantikannya dalam tahun kedua puluh zaman Yotam bin Uzia.

15:30 And a Hoshea the son of Elah formed a conspiracy against Pekah the son of Remaliah, and he struck him down and killed him and reigned in his place in the twentieth year of Jotham the son of Uzziah.

 

15:31 Selebihnya dari riwayat Pekah dan segala yang dilakukannya, sesungguhnya semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Israel.

15:31 And the rest of the acts of Pekah and all that he did are there written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel.
